alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:55PM CDT until August 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN AUTAUGA...EASTERN LOWNDES AND SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 155 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Autauga County Airport to Highland Home, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Montgomery, Prattville, Fort Deposit, Hayneville, White Hall, Lowndesboro, Strata, Naftel, Hope Hull, Dannelly Field, Logan, Sprague, Grady, Sellers, Davenport, Ramer, Pintlala, Calhoun, Manack and Letohatchee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
